text: is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-7-5. in the Ōmiya wardThe team's hometown is the city of Saitama in Saitama Prefecture, but its name comes from the former city of Ōmiya, which is now a ward of the prefectural capital city. of Saitama.Soccerway.com, "Ōmiya Ardija"; retrieved 2012-3-2. ==History== The club was founded in 1964. * 1964-1997: NTT Kanto SC * 1998-present: RB Omiya Ardija == League position == *2011 : J1 League - 13th *2012 : J1 League - 13th *2013 : J1 League - 14th *2014 : J1 League - 16th *2015 : J2 League - 1st *2016 : J1 League - 5th *2017 : J1 League - 18th *2018 : J2 League - 5th *2019 : J2 League - 3rd *2020 : J2 League - 15th === Former position === ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams * List of Omiya Ardija players == References == ==Other websites== * Omiya Ardija website * J.League Club Guide Category:Football clubs in Saitama Prefecture
title: Omiya Ardija
